--- select_singer_with_column_names.sql
SELECT
  SingerId AS ID,
  FirstName,
  LastName,
  SingerInfo,
  BirthDate
FROM Singers

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      88,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  23,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  17,
          Name: "SingerId",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   &parser.Ident{
          pos:  21,
          end:  23,
          Name: "ID",
        },
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  27,
        end:  36,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  27,
          end:  36,
          Name: "FirstName",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  40,
        end:  48,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  40,
          end:  48,
          Name: "LastName",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  52,
        end:  62,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  52,
          end:  62,
          Name: "SingerInfo",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  66,
        end:  75,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  66,
          end:  75,
          Name: "BirthDate",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  88,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   88,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  81,
            end:  88,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerId AS ID, FirstName, LastName, SingerInfo, BirthDate FROM Singers
